blogs.title: Opening Party!
blogs.body:
Why do we use it?  It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when  looking at its layout. 
 The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here timberland
